title: Python Developers Survey: Python 2 clings on for certain use cases
description:
A new survey from the Python Software Foundation has found that while Python 3 remains dominant both for work and play, usage of Python 2 crept up from the previous year. The study, in association with JetBrains which polled more than 23,000 Python developers, found 93% of respondents had already implemented Python 3, based on... Read more »

The post Python Developers Survey: Python 2 clings on for certain use cases appeared first on Developer Tech News.
